Demonstration Data for unmixR

Michael E. Winter's 1999 N-FINDR Unmixing Algorithm

Brute Force N-FINDR
nfindrLDU()
LDU N-FINDR: 2013 Improved N-FINDR Algorithm Based on LU Decompositions

LDU-Sequential N-FINDR: Slightly Modified LDU N-FINDR

unmixR's package options

General Interface to Vertex Component Analysis Spectral Unmixing Implementations
